title: How ‘Frankenstein’ Used Color to Create Victorian-Era Edinburgh: ‘Everything Is Vintage and of the Period’
summary: While beginning the pre-production process for Guillermo del Toro’s “Frankenstein,” production designer Tamara Deverell began her research by going to museums to create the look of 1850s Edinburgh. “One of the first opportunities I had to spend time with Guillermo was when we were scouting. One of …
